title: Authors and Citation
text: Zanazzi M (2025). drllama: R Code Documentation via local LLM. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/zanmat/drllama.
code: @Manual{,   title = {drllama: R Code Documentation via local LLM},   author = {Mattia Zanazzi},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/zanmat/drllama}, }

what: R Code Documentation via local LLM
title: R Code Documentation via local LLM
text: Documentation--R (Doc--R) package uses locally run Large Language Models provide documentation undocumented R code, improving readability code written others (long time ago). drllama currently offers two functions: code_to_doc: Reads .R file spits copy summary top comments throughout script functions pipes contained; droxygen: Reads function .R file spits roxygen2 document. drllama uses mall package.

title: R Code Documentation via local LLM
text: can install development version drllama GitHub : drllama requires Ollama installed running.

title: Write documentation for code — doc_to_code
text: file Path code file level Documentation level detail. Defaults light. Light: Provides description functions pipes. Heavy: lines documented (useful).

title: Write documentation for code — doc_to_code
text: new R file created adding documentation code

title: Write documentation for code — doc_to_code
code: code_to_doc("my_code.R", "light") #> Error in code_to_doc("my_code.R", "light"): could not find function "code_to_doc" code_to_doc("my_code.R", "heavy") #> Error in code_to_doc("my_code.R", "heavy"): could not find function "code_to_doc"

what: Create roxygen doc from function — droxygen
title: Create roxygen doc from function — droxygen
Create roxygen doc from function — droxygen

Create roxygen doc from function — droxygen
code: droxygen("my_new_package_function.R") #> Warning: cannot open file 'my_new_package_function.R': No such file or directory #> Error in file(con, "r"): cannot open the connection
